info: T means true, F means False. If no publications, just leave the publication structure unchanged.
name: Sabrina Setaro

publications.text: Garnica S, Riess K, Schön ME, Oberwinkler F, Setaro SD. 2016. Divergence Times and Phylogenetic Patterns of Sebacinales, a Highly Diverse and Widespread Fungal Lineage. PLoS One. DOI: 10.1371/journal.pone.0149531

Heidelberg, New York, Dordrecht, London: Springer Verlag.
